attributes.action: Close all non essential construction sites in UK now to help curb the virus
attributes.additional_details: Myself and many others feel that non essential construction sites are not safe at the moment and I fear for my safety and my pregnant wifes safety. As all sites cant work to the 2 meter rule and also we are all touching the same surfaces so a very high chance of catching the virus
attributes.background: Close all non essential construction sites in UK now to help curb the virus and help save peoples health and lives
